To be able to build the GE2/1 demonstrator into the GEMGeometry, need to change a check which creates the superchamber. 
In this case, we do an initial scan of the geometry and check if only 1 GE2/1 chamber exists, and if so, set a flag which tells the superchamber builder to build off layer 2 for GE2/1 (since only a single layer 2 chamber is present in the demonstrator).

This is an alternative to #36482, only one of these two PRs should be added.

@cvuosalo Do you think this approach is better than the previous?

#### PR validation:

I have checked the geometry builder with a run3 DDD geometry and a phase2 geometry, and they build correctly. Would need to test with Sunanda's changes also.
